oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jerry Gaither oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gaither, Jerry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Clips from an oral history with Jerry Gaither, a former Tennessee educator. Gaither shares his memories of the Second Army of Tennessee maneuvers and campus life after World War II, particularly in relation to the G.I. Bill
1. G.I. experiences at Vet Village -- 2. Gaither's memories of the Second Army of Tennessee war maneuvers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: G.I. Bill; Vet Village; Campus life; Second Army of Tennessee maneuvers; World War II
Veterans--Housing; Veterans--Education; World War, 1939-1945; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
